languages.text: "Довольно неопределенности". {n}Хейнрикс складывает руки на груди.{/n} "Если Лорд-капитан намерена связать себя отношениями с кем-то другим, я не собираюсь этому мешать..." {n}Дознаватель тяжело сглатывает — и тут же мрачнеет.{/n} "Но и играть роль праздного развлечения для Вольного Торговца я не намерен".

"No more uncertainty." {n}Heinrix folds his arms.{/n} "If the Lord Captain wishes to commit to a relationship with someone else, I won't stand in her way..." {n}He swallows with difficulty, then his expression darkens.{/n} "But nor do I intend to be part of an idle dalliance."
languages.original_text: "Довольно неопределенности". {n}Хейнрикс складывает руки на груди.{/n} "Если Лорд-капитан намерена связать себя отношениями с кем-то другим, я не собираюсь этому мешать..." {n}Дознаватель тяжело сглатывает — и тут же мрачнеет.{/n} "Но и играть роль праздного развлечения для Вольного Торговца я не намерен".

traits.locale_text: "No more uncertainty." {n}Heinrix folds his arms.{/n} "If the Lord Captain wishes to commit to a relationship with someone else, I won't stand in her way..." {n}He swallows with difficulty, then his expression darkens.{/n} "But neither do I intend to take on the role of a Rogue Trader's lark."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「これ以上不確実なことは要らない」{n}ハインリックスは腕を組んだ。{/n}「もしロード・キャプテンが他の誰かと関係を持ちたいと言うのなら、彼女の邪魔はしない…」{n}彼が苦労して飲み込むと、表情が暗くなった。{/n}「かと言って愚かな戯れに巻き込まれるつもりもない」
languages.original_text: "No more uncertainty." {n}Heinrix folds his arms.{/n} "If the Lord Captain wishes to commit to a relationship with someone else, I won't stand in her way..." {n}He swallows with difficulty, then his expression darkens.{/n} "But nor do I intend to be part of an idle dalliance."

traits.locale_text: 「これ以上不確実なことは要らない」{n}ハインリックスは腕を組んだ。{/n}「もしロード・キャプテンが他の誰かと関係を持ちたいと言うのなら、彼女の邪魔はしない…」{n}彼が苦労して飲み込むと、表情が暗くなった。{/n}「かと言って愚かな戯れに巻き込まれるつもりもない」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “我不想再有什么不确定的地方。”{n}海因里希抱起双臂。{/n}“如果舰长大人打算与别人建立亲密关系，我不会阻挠她……”{n}他费力地咽了口唾沫，随后表情黯淡下来。{/n}“但我也不想参与这种无聊的情感游戏。”
languages.original_text: "No more uncertainty." {n}Heinrix folds his arms.{/n} "If the Lord Captain wishes to commit to a relationship with someone else, I won't stand in her way..." {n}He swallows with difficulty, then his expression darkens.{/n} "But nor do I intend to be part of an idle dalliance."

traits.locale_text: “我不想再有什么不确定的地方。”{n}海因里希抱起双臂。{/n}“如果舰长大人打算与别人建立亲密关系，我不会阻挠她……”{n}他费力地咽了口唾沫，随后表情黯淡下来。{/n}“但我也不想参与这种无聊的情感游戏。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Que les choses soient bien claires entre nous, {n}répond Heinrix en croisant les bras.{/n} Si Sa Seigneurie souhaite se lier à quelqu'un d'autre, je ne l'en empêcherai pas... » {n}Il déglutit avec difficulté et son expression s'assombrit.{/n} « Mais en ce qui me concerne, je refuse de m'impliquer dans un quelconque triangle amoureux. »
languages.original_text: "No more uncertainty." {n}Heinrix folds his arms.{/n} "If the Lord Captain wishes to commit to a relationship with someone else, I won't stand in her way..." {n}He swallows with difficulty, then his expression darkens.{/n} "But nor do I intend to be part of an idle dalliance."

traits.locale_text: « Que les choses soient bien claires entre nous, {n}répond Heinrix en croisant les bras.{/n} Si Sa Seigneurie souhaite se lier à quelqu'un d'autre, je ne l'en empêcherai pas... » {n}Il déglutit avec difficulté et son expression s'assombrit.{/n} « Mais en ce qui me concerne, je refuse de m'impliquer dans un quelconque triangle amoureux. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Basta de incertidumbre». {n}Heinrix cruza los brazos.{/n} «Lord Capitán, si tiene intención de entablar una relación íntima con otra persona, no me interpondré...». {n}Traga con dificultad y su rostro se oscurece.{/n} «Pero tampoco tengo intención de ser parte de un devaneo efímero».
languages.original_text: "No more uncertainty." {n}Heinrix folds his arms.{/n} "If the Lord Captain wishes to commit to a relationship with someone else, I won't stand in her way..." {n}He swallows with difficulty, then his expression darkens.{/n} "But nor do I intend to be part of an idle dalliance."

traits.locale_text: «Basta de incertidumbre». {n}Heinrix cruza los brazos.{/n} «Lord Capitán, si tiene intención de entablar una relación íntima con otra persona, no me interpondré...». {n}Traga con dificultad y su rostro se oscurece.{/n} «Pero tampoco tengo intención de ser parte de un devaneo efímero».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Keine Unsicherheit mehr!" {n}Heinrix verschränkt die Arme.{/n} "Wenn der Lord Captain mit jemand anderem einem Beziehung eingehen möchte, werde ich nicht im Weg stehen ..." {n}Er schluckt mühsam, dann verfinstert sich seine Miene.{/n} "Aber ich werde auch nicht Teil einer flüchtigen Liebelei sein."
languages.original_text: "No more uncertainty." {n}Heinrix folds his arms.{/n} "If the Lord Captain wishes to commit to a relationship with someone else, I won't stand in her way..." {n}He swallows with difficulty, then his expression darkens.{/n} "But nor do I intend to be part of an idle dalliance."

traits.locale_text: "Keine Unsicherheit mehr!" {n}Heinrix verschränkt die Arme.{/n} "Wenn der Lord Captain mit jemand anderem einem Beziehung eingehen möchte, werde ich nicht im Weg stehen ..." {n}Er schluckt mühsam, dann verfinstert sich seine Miene.{/n} "Aber ich werde auch nicht Teil einer flüchtigen Liebelei sein."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Bu kadar belirsizlik yeter." {n}Heinrix, kollarını kavuşturuyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, eğer ki başka biriyle ilişkiye başlamayı diliyorsa ona mâni olmayacağım..." {n}Zorlukla yutkunmasının ardından yüzü asılıyor.{/n} "Ancak boş bir kaçamağın parçası olma niyetim de yok."
languages.original_text: "No more uncertainty." {n}Heinrix folds his arms.{/n} "If the Lord Captain wishes to commit to a relationship with someone else, I won't stand in her way..." {n}He swallows with difficulty, then his expression darkens.{/n} "But nor do I intend to be part of an idle dalliance."

traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
